history.proof: intros. unfold mm_no_self_loops in *. hauto lq: on use: subcode_app_invert_right. qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: or_introl. qsimpl time: 1 use: or_introl. qsimpl time: 1 use: or_introl,subcode_app_end.

exceptions.tactic: intros i n Q P H1 H2.
intros i' n Q P H1 H2.
intros i' n' Q P H1 H2.
intros i' n' Q' P H1 H2.
intros i' n' Q' P' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment n, i : nat P, Q : list (mm_instr (pos n)) H : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), ~ (i0, DECₐ x i0 :: nil) <sc (i, P) H0 : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), ~ (i0, DECₐ x i0 :: nil) <sc (length P + i, Q) H3 : nat H4 : pos n Unable to unify "nat" with "~ (H3, DECₐ H4 H3 :: nil) <sc (i, P ++ Q)".

In environment n, i : nat P, Q : list (mm_instr (pos n)) H : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), (exists l r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = l ++ DECₐ x i0 :: r /\\ i0 = i + length l) -> False H0 : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), (exists l r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), Q = l ++ DECₐ x i0 :: r /\\ i0 = length P + i + length l) -> False H4 : pos n l, r : list (mm_instr (pos n)) H1 : P ++ Q = l ++ DECₐ H4 (i + length l) :: r Unable to unify "?M1948 \\/ ?M1949" with "False".

In environment H2 : forall A B : Prop, A -> A \\/ B n, i : nat P, Q : list (mm_instr (pos n)) H : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), (exists l r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = l ++ DECₐ x i0 :: r /\\ i0 = i + length l) -> False H0 : forall (i0 : nat) (x : pos n), (exists l r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), Q = l ++ DECₐ x i0 :: r /\\ i0 = length P + i + length l) -> False H4 : pos n l, r : list (mm_instr (pos n)) H1 : P ++ Q = l ++ DECₐ H4 (i + length l) :: r Unable to unify "P ++ Q = l ++ DECₐ H4 (i + length l) :: r" with "False".

exceptions.tactic: apply subcode_app_end in Hin as [Hin | Hin].

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: nat
n: nat
Q: list (mm_instr (pos n))
P: list (mm_instr (pos n))

Goal:
mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)

Premises:
mm_no_self_loops = fun Q : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) => forall (i : nat) (x : pos n), ~ (i, DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc Q : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> Prop
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
subcode_length_le : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> fst Q <= fst P /\ fst P + length (snd P) <= fst Q + length (snd Q)
subcode_cons_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (J : X) (Q : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, J :: Q) -> i = j /\ I = J \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (S j, Q)
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), m // m0 -1> m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), m // m0 -1> m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ~~> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s ~~> se -> Q s
subcode_app_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (Q1 Q2 : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1 ++ Q2) -> (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1) \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (length Q1 + j, Q2)
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
list_an_app_inv : forall (a n : nat) (l r : list nat), list_an a n = l ++ r -> l = list_an a (length l) /\ r = list_an (a + length l) (length r)
subcode_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l r : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
subcode = fun (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : forall X : Type, code X -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode {X}%type_scope _ _ /
subcode_cons_inj : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (ρ δ : X) (P : code X), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ
subcode_snoc_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
sss_loop_sound : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data) (C1 C2 : data -> Prop), (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C2 x -> exists y : data, sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec x y) -> forall x : data, pre x -> (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n)) -> exists (n : nat) (y : data), sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec (iter f x n) y
Inductive mma_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mma_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mma_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x]) Arguments mma_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
subcode_cons_invert_left : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i : nat) (I : X) (l : list X), (i, I :: l) <sc Q -> (i, I :: nil) <sc Q /\ (S i, l) <sc Q
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mm_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
subcode_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a r : list X), j = i -> (i, a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
firstn_app_2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), firstn (length l1 + n) (l1 ++ l2) = l1 ++ firstn n l2
code_end = fun (X : Type) (P : code X) => fst P + length (snd P) : forall X : Type, code X -> nat Arguments code_end {X}%type_scope _ /
in_code_subcode : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X), in_code i P -> exists a : X, (i, a :: nil) <sc P
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
in_mm_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[u/x])
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
subcode_app_end : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (n : nat) (l r : list X), P <sc (n, l) -> P <sc (n, l ++ r)
app_nth2_plus : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), nth (length l + n) (l ++ l') d = nth n l' d

```coq
intros i n Q P H1 H2.
unfold mm_no_self_loops in *.
intros H3 H4.
apply H3.
intros i' x Hin.
apply or_introl.
apply H1.
apply subcode_app_end in Hin as [Hin | Hin].
- apply Hin.
- destruct Hin as [l [r [Heq Hineq]]].
  apply app_nth2_plus in Hineq.
  subst i'.
  apply H2 in Hineq.
  simpl in Hineq.
  exact Hineq.
Qed.
```

original: intros i n Q P H1 H2. unfold mm_no_self_loops in *. intros H3 H4. apply H3. intros i' x Hin. apply or_introl. apply H1. apply subcode_app_end in Hin as [Hin | Hin]. - apply Hin. - destruct Hin as [l [r [Heq Hineq]]]. apply app_nth2_plus in Hineq. subst i'. apply H2 in Hineq. simpl in Hineq. apply Hineq.
